title: 150 Days of Flattening the Curve | Guest: Target Tori | 8/13/20
description:
After 150 days of flattening the curve, have we flattened it yet? The woke movement is teaching Americans to be racist. Seattle just lost a great police chief, and New York is heading toward layoffs. Three doctors told USA Today that making a coronavirus vaccine mandatory and punishing those who don’t take it is our “patriotic duty." Glenn reviews last night’s show about the Great Reset, a global plot to destroy capitalism and reshape the world using national socialism. Stu lists the five things you need to know about Kamala Harris. Target Tori, who went viral after a customer tried to shame her online, joins to discuss her “Pause. Be Kind” movement and a campaign to help another worker shamed online, Kroger Andy.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
